radiographic_examinations.findings: Right ventricular dilatation, hypokinesis, and a classic D shape in the left ventricle indicating right ventricular overload.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: After treatment with inotropic agents and inhaled nitric oxide, dilatation in the right ventricle became less pronounced, and right ventricular function improved from moderate-to-severe impairment to mild impairment.
